meanings.sent1: The dark clouds foreshadowed a storm approaching.

meanings.definition: To give a suggestion of (what is to come)
meanings.sent1: The eerie silence foreshadowed the ghostly encounter.
meanings.sent2: The protagonist's hesitation foreshadowed the plot twist.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient foreshadowed the surprising taste of the dish.
meanings.sent4: The first few drops of rain foreshadowed the impending downpour.
meanings.sent5: The broken mirror foreshadowed seven years of bad luck.
